ValidationRule.description: in Axcessa Opportunity, verifies if there's data in Contract Date Sent field before advancing to next stage in sales process.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( (ISBLANK( Contract_Date_Sent__c )), RecordType.DeveloperName = "axcessa", OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Closed Won"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Sent"), ISPICKVAL( StageName, "Contract Received") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Data missing. Check Contract Date Sent.
